name: BacterialAndFungalBloodCultureTests
title: Bacterial and Fungal Blood Culture Tests
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent laboratory test concepts for bacteria and fungi in blood cultures.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Laboratory Test.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes lab tests that identify bacteria and fungi in blood cultures.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent an order only.)
